item.title: Module 4 Voting
item.description: Voting and Political Participation in Texas Introduction: Voting and Political Participation in a Changing Texas Figure 7.1 This 1898 General Land Office map of Fort Bend County shows land grants that date back to those secured from Spain by Stephen F. Austin. Many of the original bounderies are still in place today. Image Credit: Andrew Teas, License: CC BY Fort Bend County covers an area along the Brazos River southwest of Houston.

item.title: Module 5 Political Parties
item.description: Unit 5 Political Parties in Texas Introduction: Political Parties in Texas Chapter Learning Objective By the end of this chapter, you will be able to: Evaluate the role played by political parties in Texas Introduction At some point, most of us have found ourselves part of a group trying to solve a problem, like picking a restaurant or movie to attend or completing a big project at school or work. Members of the group probably had various opinions about what should be done.
